item.title: 【Cinema Center】SERIES - We.Baby.Bears.S02.1080p.HMAX.WEB-DL.DDP2.0.H.265-GV1992 [COMPLETE]
item.description:
Follow Grizz, Panda and Ice Bear – as their younger baby selves – traveling in a magical box to fantastic new worlds searching for a place to call home. Along the way, they meet new friends, learn a few lessons and discover that “home” can mean wherever they are, as long as they’re together.
Click to expand...
This season contains the ENTIRETY of season two! The second half of the season (which includes the "Yokai Art School", "Cosmic Big Bros" and "Worlds Apart" episodes) has actually aired internationally before it would reach the United States' Cartoon Network station. Because I have access to international HBO Max, I was able to get all of the episodes together in full.

Even though the "Yokai Art School" episodes are supposed to chronologically take place before the "Cosmic Big Bros" arc (as shown internationally), this release will be listed as followed by the US airdate order listed on Futon Critic, Gracenote, TheTVDB and TheMovieDB.

Ripped by yours truly. This was initially requested by user "hardy34435", though I've decided to make the release available for all users here instead of just for one person since the second half of the season is not widely available on prominent ‍☠️ sites. Enjoy, and please DL/share carefully and responsibly.

NOTE: The "Worlds Apart" episodes (E30-34) do not have subtitles.
Episode release names:
